review.title: “Updated my knowledge, good friendly climate,Innovative foot steps,good management”
review.pros: Pros – Basically i am interested in tunnel projects ,So their is opportunity to work for one of project of Rohan Builders I.P.L.to upgrade my knowledge & experience.
review.cons: Cons – Newly launched in infra projects,So their is errors in management but it will be overcome.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Use the skill of managements.

review.title: “Opportunity to test the SKILL's....”
review.pros: Pros – Great balance with Professional Life & Social Life.
review.cons: Cons – Motivation,Discipline,Training,lack of Confidence in employee's
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Motivation,Training for all Level's of staff.

review.title: “very good”
review.pros: Pros – In Rohan Builders there is a team work
review.cons: Cons – spacious working place is not available in Rohan Builders
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Best till date.”
review.pros: Pros – Exposure level for work is very high and every day is a new learning experience
review.cons: Cons – There is always a scope for improvement
